monsters.name: Helwyr
monsters.description: Leader of the Cywir hunters, possessing ancient powers of transformation.

monsters.name: Avaryss and Nymora
monsters.description: Feared for invoking Zamorak's wrath on those who have sworn a false oath.

monsters.name: Gregorovic
monsters.description: Sliske's secret weapon, an undead creature housing the mind of a madman.

monsters.name: Telos (Phase 1)
monsters.description: It won't stop until it can be sure the Heart is safe.

attacks.name: The aid of nature
attacks.description: Inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s and gives the enemy +${onHitEffect1modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns

attacks.name: Rake and rend
attacks.description: Deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage and inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.description: Deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage across ${hitCount} hits. Also inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Wall charge
attacks.description: Avaryss dashes between the walls. Hits ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's normal damage each and applies stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Avaryss dashes between the walls. Hits <count> times for <damage> each and <hitEffect>

attacks.name: Ceiling collapse
attacks.description: Nymora attacks the ceiling. Stalactites hit ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's normal damage
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Nymora attacks the ceiling. Stalactites hit <count> times, dealing <damage>

attacks.name: Channelled bomb
attacks.description: Avaryss and Nemora charge and detonate a bomb, for a total of ${hitCount} hits across ${duration}s. First hits deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's normal damage and ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of the enemy's normal damage on the 6th attack. Also, gives the enemy +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% more Damage taken for ${preHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Avaryss and Nemora charge and detonate a bomb, for a total of <count> hits across <duration>. First hits deal <damage>. Also, <prehitEffect>

attacks.name: Hurricane
attacks.description: Spins around, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage

attacks.name: Fire wall
attacks.description: Cause a wall of fire, dealing ${hitCount} times ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Cause a wall of fire, dealing <count> times <damage>

attacks.name: Projectile
attacks.description: Fire a ranged projectile, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage (Can't miss)

attacks.name: Trick knife
attacks.description: Throws a trick knife, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's normal damage ${hitCount} times
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Throws a trick knife, dealing <damage> <count> times

attacks.name: Glaive throw
attacks.description: Throws gloves into the air, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage ${hitCount} times
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Throws gloves into the air, dealing <damage> <count> times

attacks.name: Crystal Rain
attacks.description: Fires ${hitCount} arrows, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage each.

attacks.name: From the Shadows
attacks.description: Summons a wright, which attacks your enemy 5 times for ${attackDamageMinValue0}%-${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit each. The wright's attacks can't miss.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Summons a wright, which attacks your enemy 5 times for <damage> each. The wright's attack <canMiss>.

attacks.name: Blackhole
attacks.description: Creates a swirling black hole around you. Gives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Melee Max Hit for ${preHitEffect0turns} of your turns and hits the enemy for ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMinValue0}%-${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit each.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Creates a swirling black hole around you. <PrehitEffect> and hits the enemy for <count> times, dealing <damage> each.

shopPurchases.customDescription: Grants access to the fight against Telos, the Warden (once implemented, works retroactively)
